timeline.bodyText: Isn't this triggering every time (maxX - minX) > 180? Doesn't mean the dateline has been crossed though.
timeline.author: aaime

replies.bodyText:
I will double check but I don't think so.
We are already excluding at least that maxX - minX > 360 (we are in the else) and we have already shifted the values to be in the range -180, 180 plus some extent adjustment.
a case like [-91, 91] will be 0 < 0 not triggering.
a case like [-1, 181] will be 0 < 1 triggering.
a case like [-181, 1] will be -1 < 0 triggering.
I think it should work but let me know if I have missed some cases here.
